description: Try our easy to follow Pirate & Princess Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pirate & Princess Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For the Princess cakes, swirl a generous spoonful of buttercream icing on the top of the 6 remaining cakes. Pile the sweets on top with a few silver balls, then sprinkle with edible glitter dust, if using.
